actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 118(a) of title 28, United States Code, to provide for the holding of court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania at Lancaster, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: States that the Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania shall be held at Lancaster, in addition to Allentown, Easton, Reading, and Philadelphia as currently provided.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 118(a) of title 28, United States Code, to provide for the holding of court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania at Lancaster, Pennsylvania.
